dcterms:creator: T. P. Lillicrap
J. J. Hunt
A. Pritzel
N. Heess
T. Erez
Y. Tassa
D. Silver
D. Wierstra
dcterms:description: DDPG is an off-policy actor-critic deep reinforcement learning method that operates in continuous action spaces, allowing for efficient learning of policies conditioned on goals.
dcterms:title: DDPG (Deep Deterministic Policy Gradient)

dcterms:creator: M. Andrychowicz
D. Crow
A. Ray
J. Schneider
R. Fong
P. Welinder
B. McGrew
J. Tobin
P. Abbeel
W. Zaremba
dcterms:description: HER is an extension to reinforcement learning algorithms that allows agents to learn from failed attempts by reinterpreting them as successful attempts at different goals.
dcterms:title: HER (Hindsight Experience Replay)

dcterms:creator: C. Florensa
D. Held
X. Geng
P. Abbeel
dcterms:description: GOID is a dataset that automatically generates goals of intermediate difficulty for reinforcement learning agents, facilitating the learning process by providing appropriately challenging tasks.
dcterms:title: GOID (Goals of Intermediate Difficulty)

dcterms:creator: J. Schulman
S. Levine
M. Jordan
P. Abbeel
dcterms:description: TRPO is a reinforcement learning algorithm that optimizes policies while ensuring that the updates are within a trust region, improving stability and performance.
dcterms:title: Trust Region Policy Optimization (TRPO)

dcterms:creator: Y. Bengio
J. Louradour
R. Collobert
J. Weston
dcterms:description: Curriculum Learning is a strategy in machine learning where models are trained on easier tasks before progressing to harder ones, improving learning efficiency.
dcterms:title: Curriculum Learning

dcterms:creator: M. P. Kumar
B. Packer
D. Koller
dcterms:description: Self-Paced Learning is a method where learners are presented with training samples in an order that reflects their current capabilities, gradually increasing the difficulty.
dcterms:title: Self-Paced Learning

dcterms:creator: A. Graves
M. G. Bellemare
J. Menick
R. Munos
K. Kavukcuoglu
dcterms:description: Automated Curriculum Learning is a method that automatically generates a sequence of tasks for training neural networks, optimizing the learning process.
dcterms:title: Automated Curriculum Learning
